name: PeopleSoft: Move PeopleCode to a Component or Page Definition
description:
This metric reports all PeopleCode artifacts testing the Component name.
It detects the following branching statement constructs:
- If %Component = ...Then
- If boolean_expr1 and/or boolean_expr2 and/or %Component = ... Then
- Evaluate %Component When = …
output:
This report lists all artifacts testing the Component name.
It provides the following information:
- PeopleCode artifacts full name
- The associated value is the number of of test occurrences found in the artifact source code
rationale:
Analyze transactions and move PeopleCode that is specific to a component from the record definition to the component or page definition. This action eliminates the need to execute conditional statements, such as If %Component = .
This action helps only if you are able to move all the PeopleCode in a program from the record to a component or page, and multiple components access that record.
remediation: Move PeopleCode to a Component or Page Definition
remediationSample: same code, without the test for If %Component, inside the Component definition itself.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Events, Functions and Methods
